name: pfquest-turtle
description: This AddOn is a [pfQuest](https://github.com/shagu/pfQuest) extension, which adds support for the [TurtleWoW](https://turtle-wow.org/) Private Server. In order to run this extension, the latest version of [pfQuest](https://github.com/shagu/pfQuest) is always required and only enUS-Gameclients are supported.
